alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 6:19PM MST until January 27 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Huerfano and western Las Animas County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially as temperatures continue to drop and any melted snow re-freezes on untreated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS....
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
